data.name: UsageStatement
data.value:
Usage: ZptBuilder.exe [options] [inputs]
Selected options:
--help,-h Display this usage statement and exit
--version Display version information and exit
--html,-t Force HTML mode
--xml,-x Force XML mode
--no-xml-declaration Omit XML declaration when rendering XML
--input-filename-pattern=PATTERN,-p Search pattern for files to render when the input is a directory path
--output=LOCATION,-o Saves output to the specified path
--output-filename-extension=EXT,-E The extension for output file names
--ignore=PATH,-i Do not render files within this path
--output-encoding=ENCODING,-n Sets the output character encoding
Full documentation can be found in the manpage for ZptBuilder. For systems without 'man', a copy is provided in the file: ZptBuilder.MANUAL.txt
Up-to-date documentation and information is available at: http://csf-dev.github.io/ZPT-Sharp/

data.name: CannotParseOptionsError
data.value: ERROR: The command-line arguments provided were not be understood. Use 'ZptBuilder.exe --help' for help on providing correct arguments, or consult the manual.

data.name: HtmlAndXmlModesMutuallyExclusiveError
data.value: ERROR: The '--html' and '--xml' arguments are mutually exclusive and may not be used together. Use 'ZptBuilder.exe --help' for help on providing correct arguments, or consult the manual.

data.name: InvalidInputPathFormat
data.value: ERROR: A specified input path is invalid, perhaps it does not exist or you have insufficient permissions to access it? The problematic path is:{0}

data.name: CouldNotCreateContextVisitorFormat
CouldNotCreateRenderingContextFactory
data.value: ERROR: The type named using the --rendering-context-factory argument could not be instantiated. Where specified, this type must exist and have a parameterless constructor.

data.name: InvalidOutputPath
data.value: ERROR: The specified output path is invalid. Where a directory path is specified, the directory must exist. Where a file path is specified, the file's parent directory must exist. Please consult the manual for further guidance.

data.name: InvalidKeywordOptionFormat
InvalidEncoding
data.value: ERROR: The encoding specified by the --output-encoding argument is invalid. The encoding (where specified) must be valid encoding 'WebName'. Consult the manual for more information.

data.name: NoInputs
data.value: ERROR: You must specify at least one input path (or use '-' to signify reading from standard input). Use 'ZptBuilder.exe --help', or consult the manual.

data.name: CannotInputFromStdInAndPaths
data.value: ERROR: The inputs must either be a list of paths OR '-' (indicating the use of standard input), not both. Use 'ZptBuilder.exe --help', or consult the manual.

data.name: UnexpectedErrorFormat
data.value:
ERROR: The application has encountered a fatal unexpected error; please report this as a bug at https://github.com/csf-dev/ZPT-Sharp
Please include the information below with your bug report --- {0}
